Name: MemeSnarker_9e
Text: Just tried to cook dinner and somehow managed to set off the smoke alarm instead. Guess I’m a culinary genius in my own smoky way. Someone send help (and maybe takeout).

Comments.Name: QueryQuest_60
Comments.Text: What assumptions are we making about the intentions behind this, and how might they be limiting our understanding?
